## Conversation that answers the provided questions:
**User:**
Hey, I've been thinking about creating my own custom currency and I heard that Verus might be a good option. How do I program my own custom currency launch system using Verus?

**AI Assistant:**
Actually, you don't need to program your own custom currency launch system using Verus. Verus provides an easy-to-use system for launching currencies with various features such as Kickstarter-like minimums, dynamic pricing, and pre-launch participation discounts, all specified in easy-to-understand commands and parameters, without requiring any programming.

**User:**
That's great to know! Another question I had was, can Verus currencies only be launched to accept a single other currency?

**AI Assistant:**
No, Verus currencies can be launched to accept a range of other currencies. Additionally, they can be launched with or without fractional reserve capabilities.

**User:**
I've also been wondering about integrating Verus with other blockchains. Is it not possible to integrate Verus with other blockchains?

**AI Assistant:**
Yes, it is possible to integrate Verus with other blockchains. Verus import/export protocol was designed to make integration with other blockchains provable and easy. In fact, there are already external bridges in progress that expect to enable automatic send/receive of any Verus network token between Verus and ETH/ERC20 tokens.

**User:**
That sounds very promising. I've heard about Verus' merge mining and multi-chain technology. Will it only allow two Verus network blockchains to operate independently and be dynamically merge mined?

**AI Assistant:**
No, the Verus merge mining and multi-chain technology will allow Verus network chains to operate fully independently, yet be dynamically merge mined along with Verus and up to 20 other Verus network blockchains on a single hash, earning rewards and powering all chains simultaneously.

**User:**
One last question I had was about the testnet. Will the testnet coins/currencies retain their value even after VRSCTEST is reset?

**AI Assistant:**
No, all testnet coins/currencies have no value and will disappear whenever VRSCTEST is reset.
AI Assistant
N/A
How do I program my own custom currency launch system using Verus?

You don't need to program your own custom currency launch system using Verus. Verus provides an easy-to-use system for launching currencies with various features such as Kickstarter-like minimums, dynamic pricing, and pre-launch participation discounts, all specified in easy-to-understand commands and parameters, without requiring any programming.

# The Best Way to Launch a Currency
Currency launches with Kickstarter-like minimums to activate or, if not met, automatically refund, dynamic currency launch pricing, based on participation, pre-launch participation price discounts, pre-conversion reserve currency carveouts, and price-neutral launch pre-allocations, all specified in easy to understand commands and parameters, no programming necessary!Currencies can be launched to accept a range of other currencies and with or without fractional reserve capabilities. Verus import/export protocol was designed to make integration with other block chains provable and easy, and there are already external bridges in progress that expect to enable automatic send/receive of any Verus network token between Verus and ETH/ERC20 tokens, where currencies can be sent between Verus and ETH, expressed as Verus currencies on the Verus network, and exposed automatically on ETH as an ERC20 token.# Preparing for Multi-chain, Dynamic Merge Mining
While this 0.7.1 testnet enables on-chain token currency definition, the same advances will soon be available on the Verus merge mining and multi-chain technology which was running on testnet last year. When enabled, this will make it possible for Verus network chains to operate fully independently, yet be dynamically merge mineable along with Verus and up to 20 other Verus network blockchains on a single hash, earning rewards and powering all chains simultaneously. All network blockchains will provide the same fractional currency capabilities, both for on-chain tokens as well as native zk-SNARK supporting currencies as well.## Sending and Converting Currency
**Warning: All testnet coins/currencies have no value and will disappear whenever VRSCTEST is reset**
